captions.text:
"Improbable Scenes",
everybody plays.

You wrote scene suggestions
for us out there,

you put them in this box
and now I'll read them

and they will make scenes
inspired by your suggestions.

For instance,
one of your ideas was:
'Improbable ads for buses'

How many times have you
caught yourself thinking:

'God, I wish I felt like
I'm in a sardine can'!
Well, now you can...

Hi. I'm the driver of this bus.
I need to give you a quick message,

- Buddy, I have to go to work!
- Easy, just a minute.
'What are the thoughts of a curtain'?
C'mon, talk!
C'mon, talk!

Talk!
You never open up to me!

What are you doing,
now that you quit theatre?

- Just helping the blinds...
- Charity work, cool...
What are you doin' here?

It's venetian,
so I'm speaking italian...
What are you doin' in this room?
I apologize for him.
'The world's worst florist'
Grow! Grow! Grow! Grow!

- Do you have a rose?
- No, just daisy.

- Don't you have an hortensia?
- Daisy.

- Do you...
- Daisy.

- Give me a bouquet...
- Daisy, nice to meet you.

- Hi, how are you?
- How are you?

- Do you have buttercups?
- No, I'm trying to lose weight, okay?
Oh, God...

- Hey, buddy...
- How you're doing?

- Do you have buttercups?
- She just went off to fight Mojo Jojo...
She'll be back soon...
'Worst situations in a gym'

- May I help you?
- I'd like to become a member...

- I'd like to become a member...
- He would like...

Okay.
'What if Beethoven was brazilian'?
[plays 'Show das Poderosas']

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

Your honor, I ask
permission to take off my hat.

After all, a gorilla has
much more to offer...
